casebody.data:
Rose Marie Bonomo et al. v. The Capitol City Lumber Company et al.

King, C. J., Alcorn, House, Thim and Ryan, Js.

Argued April 6 decided April 7, 1967 Sebastian J. Russo, for the appellants (plaintiffs). Harry L. Nair, for the appellees (defendants). Per Curiam.

The question on this appeal involves an issue of fact, and the verdict of the jury was a result reasonably reached on a permissible view of the evidence.

There is no error.
